word_mean: 异化作用：异化作用或过程，见dissimilate。反义词为assimilation

sentence.Network_en: The old French marbre became the English marble by dissimilation.
sentence.Network_cn: 古老的法国大理石通过异化变成了英国大理石.

sentence.Network_en: Abnormal administrative ethics is a dissimilation phenomenon of administrative power.
sentence.Network_cn: 行政伦理失范,是行政权力的一种异化现象.

sentence.Network_en: The dissimilation labor theory of Marx is had 2 heavy features and 2 serious effect.
sentence.Network_cn: 马克思的异化劳动理论具有二重特征与二重效应.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 异字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 异花传粉〖 cross-pollination〗 异化〖 dissimilation〗 异己〖 alien〗.
生物学中英文名词对照表_互动百科 ... 同化作用 assimilation 异化作用 dissimilation 自养型 autotrophy.
disproportionation 歧化dissimilation 异化酌dissipation of energy 能量耗散
英汉常用生物学词汇_专业词汇... ... disseminule 传播体，散布器官 dissimilation 异化作用，分解作用 dissipation 分散，逸散.

list.abs: 如英语 pilgrim 来自拉丁语peregrēnus,拉丁语里的第一个 r 已经异化成 l 如果这种变化涉及到相邻的音,就叫做邻近异化(contiguous dissimilation),例如拉丁语的.
anticipatory control 先期控制anticipatory dissimilation 先行异化anticipatory error 预期错误
juxtapositional assimilation 令近同化juxtapositional dissimilation 令近异化Jcurve J 曲线

Shenzhen person is wealthy , but , wealthy Shenzhen person thinks just like certain person in that way by monetary dissimilation , became dinkum economic animal ?深圳人富了，但是，有钱的深圳人是不是就象某些人认为的那样被金钱异化，成为纯粹的经济动物了呢？

means.word_mean: 1. a linguistic process by which one of two similar sounds in a word becomes less like the other;

sentences.sentence: "the Old French MARBRE became the English MARBLE by dissimilation"

means.word_mean: 2. breakdown of more complex substances into simpler ones with release of energy

stems_affixes.word_buile: simil相类似,一样+ar……的→adj.[to]相似的,类似的
veri=very+similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]→非常相似
similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]+ly表副词→adv.同样地, 类似于
dis不+simil相类似,一样+ation表名词→不相同
fac事实+simil相类似,一样+e→实际一样→眷写
similar[adj.[to]相似的,类似的]+ity表名词→n.类似,相似;类似点
as不断+simil相同+ate表动词→成为相同→同化
